name: Mahjong Fantasy
description:
Play the traditional Chinese game of Mahjong Solitaire in 3D.

The goal is to eliminate all the tiles in pairs, until all the tiles are gone.

Game features include:

► Full 3D environment
► Over 70 tile layouts, with varying tile counts
► 3 different tile sets (Dragons, Fish & Animals)
► Undo & Redo moves
► Undo all moves and start from the beginning with the same tile layout
► Stuck?, take a hint
► Shuffle the board, to create a solvable board
► All layouts are solvable
► Show all legal tiles
► Save best time of each level
► Full how to play tutorial
► No ads or in-app purchases

For technical support, feature requests and general feedback, join our forums:

► http://forums.afterdarkstudios.co.uk/
